bestIdea.name: The Clockwork City of New Babbage
bestIdea.description: Journey through the sprawling steampunk metropolis of New Babbage, where steam-powered machines and clockwork wonders define the landscape. Traverse cobblestone streets, navigate through bustling markets, and marvel at the towering airship docks.

otherIdeas.name: The Steam-Powered Transcontinental Railway
otherIdeas.description: Embark on a journey across a vast continent aboard a steam-powered train. Experience the marvels of steampunk engineering as you travel through diverse landscapes, from industrial cities to serene countrysides.

otherIdeas.name: The Airship Voyage to the Floating Isles
otherIdeas.description: Take to the skies in a grand airship, navigating through clouds and mechanical wonders to reach the legendary Floating Isles. Witness the beauty of steampunk aviation and the mysteries of the sky.
